title: Saint-loup
author: Saint-loup
created_time: July 05, 2022, 08:22:55 PMLast edit: July 10, 2022, 10:11:11 PM by Saint-loup
content: Is there a way to get the time with seconds on Windows 11 without installing a new software for that?I am using the command prompt with the command time but the command asks to enter a new time, you can ofc leave it as it is but I don't like that.I would like to get the time with seconds in a clean way.I've finally found a rather convenient solution, I created a desktop (and keyboard) shortcut toward C:\Windows\System32\timedate.cpl It displays a clock with the seconds
